Servant of the Alchemist:
Sir Edward, an alchemist, completed studies on the creation of the Philosopher's Stone. He found all the necessary materials to create a powerful artifact and put them in storage in the chests. He would be happy to show everyone what happened from his experiences, but the keys to the chests were lost during the monster attacks. You will find the keys, with the help of which you can open the chests and pick up what you find there ...
